headline.print_headline: Obama, Erdogan Speak by Phone, Vow Cooperation Against Terrorism
headline.main: Obama, Erdogan Speak by Phone, Vow Cooperation Against Terrorism

snippet: U.S. President Barack Obama and Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan on Tuesday pledged continued cooperation in the fight against militants, including Islamic State and Kurdistan Workers Party (PKK) militants, the White House and Turkish presidential...
lead_paragraph: U.S. President Barack Obama and Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan on Tuesday pledged continued cooperation in the fight against militants, including Islamic State and Kurdistan Workers Party (PKK) militants, the White House and Turkish presidential sources said.

headline.print_headline: Erdogan Says Europe Aiding Terrorism With Support for Kurdish Militants
headline.main: Erdogan Says Europe Aiding Terrorism With Support for Kurdish Militants

snippet: Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan accused Europe on Sunday of abetting terrorism with its support for the PKK and said he did not care if Europe called him a dictator as he cracks down on the Kurdish militant group and its sympathizers....
lead_paragraph: Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan accused Europe on Sunday of abetting terrorism with its support for the PKK and said he did not care if Europe called him a dictator as he cracks down on the Kurdish militant group and its sympathizers.

headline.print_headline: The Latest: Woman Gets 12 Years on Federal Terrorism Charge
headline.main: The Latest: Woman Gets 12 Years on Federal Terrorism Charge

snippet: The Latest on the sentencing of a Mississippi woman who pleaded guilty to conspiring to provide material support to a terrorist organization, the Islamic State group (all times local):...
lead_paragraph: The Latest on the sentencing of a Mississippi woman who pleaded guilty to conspiring to provide material support to a terrorist organization, the Islamic State group (all times local):

headline.print_headline: Denmark Strips Man of Citizenship After Terrorism Conviction
headline.main: Denmark Strips Man of Citizenship After Terrorism Conviction

snippet: Denmark's Supreme Court on Wednesday stripped the citizenship from a Danish-Moroccan bookseller jailed for inciting terrorism, upholding the verdict of a lower court and potentially paving the way for his deportation to Morocco....
lead_paragraph: Denmark's Supreme Court on Wednesday stripped the citizenship from a Danish-Moroccan bookseller jailed for inciting terrorism, upholding the verdict of a lower court and potentially paving the way for his deportation to Morocco.

headline.print_headline: Russia Says Turkey Suppresses Kurds Under Pretext of Fighting Terrorism
headline.main: Russia Says Turkey Suppresses Kurds Under Pretext of Fighting Terrorism

snippet: Anakara is hindering Kurdish forces in their fight against Islamic State and using the slogan of a "war against terrorism" to suppress Kurdish organizations in Syria and Turkey, Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov said on Wednesday....
lead_paragraph: Anakara is hindering Kurdish forces in their fight against Islamic State and using the slogan of a "war against terrorism" to suppress Kurdish organizations in Syria and Turkey, Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Activists Raise Concerns Over Indonesia's Proposed Anti-Terrorism Law
headline.main: Activists Raise Concerns Over Indonesia's Proposed Anti-Terrorism Law

snippet: Rights activists on Friday called on Indonesia's parliament to reject government proposals designed to tighten the country's anti-terrorism laws....
lead_paragraph: Rights activists on Friday called on Indonesia's parliament to reject government proposals designed to tighten the country's anti-terrorism laws.

headline.print_headline: Bahrain Jails Four Men on Terrorism Charges: Prosecutor
headline.main: Bahrain Jails Four Men on Terrorism Charges: Prosecutor

snippet: A Bahraini court sentenced four people to five years in prison for plotting to receive explosives and weapons training to carry out attacks in the Gulf Arab kingdom, the public prosecutor said in a statement on Thursday....
lead_paragraph: A Bahraini court sentenced four people to five years in prison for plotting to receive explosives and weapons training to carry out attacks in the Gulf Arab kingdom, the public prosecutor said in a statement on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Judge Blasts Repeated Delays in Jailed Man's Terrorism Trial
headline.main: Judge Blasts Repeated Delays in Jailed Man's Terrorism Trial

snippet: A federal judge says she's unhappy that a suburban Chicago terrorism suspect is still in jail awaiting trial nearly four years after his arrest in an FBI sting....
lead_paragraph: A federal judge says she's unhappy that a suburban Chicago terrorism suspect is still in jail awaiting trial nearly four years after his arrest in an FBI sting.

headline.print_headline: Iran's Rouhani Says Main Problem in Syria Is Terrorism
headline.main: Iran's Rouhani Says Main Problem in Syria Is Terrorism

snippet: The Syrian people must be left to decide their own future, Iranian President Hassan Rouhani said on Thursday, adding that defeating terrorism was Syria's main problem and not who is running the country....
lead_paragraph: The Syrian people must be left to decide their own future, Iranian President Hassan Rouhani said on Thursday, adding that defeating terrorism was Syria's main problem and not who is running the country.

headline.print_headline: Defense Opposes Anonymous Jury in February Terrorism Trial
headline.main: Defense Opposes Anonymous Jury in February Terrorism Trial

snippet: The lawyer for a Vietnamese man facing a terrorism trial in the United States is urging a judge to reject the government's demands for an anonymous jury....
lead_paragraph: The lawyer for a Vietnamese man facing a terrorism trial in the United States is urging a judge to reject the government's demands for an anonymous jury.
